course.title: History and Philosophy of Experimentation in Biology
course.description: We will trace the influence of particular philosophical arguments concerning science that have developed over the last 500 years with the evolution of Scientific Method in biology, showing how changes in philosophy wrought changes in methodology. The course will include readings from philosophers, statisticians and working scientists, and select experiments from the time period 1600-2015.
